TITLE: Nio reports wider second-quarter loss despite increase in EV shipments
SUMMARY: Nio's second-quarter loss widened, but the company expects higher production and deliveries in the third quarter.

TITLE: GameStop reports wider loss, announces partnership with crypto exchange FTX
SUMMARY: GameStop said quarterly sales declined and losses widened, as its inventory of video game equipment and more swelled.

TITLE: Oracle reports 18% revenue growth after Cerner deal closes
SUMMARY: Oracle said electronic health-record software maker Cerner contributed $1.4 billion to quarterly revenue.

TITLE: FedEx cutting costs, withdraws 2023 guidance after first-quarter shipments disappoint
SUMMARY: FedEx withdrew its full-year guidance and announced significant cost-cutting measures following what it called softness in global volume of shipments.

TITLE: FedEx shares sink after company cites weakening global demand
SUMMARY: Shares of FedEx sank Friday morning after the company withdrew its full-year guidance and cited weakening global demand.
